com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell

Class TimeoutKillableObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.TimeoutKillableObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KillableObserver

    public final class TimeoutKillableObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements KillableObserver

    KillableObserver implementation which will kill its observed Killable if it is still being observed after a given amount of time has elapsed.

    Note that this class can only observe one Killable at a time; multiple instances should be used for concurrent calls to Command.execute(byte[], KillableObserver, boolean).

      Returns true if the observed process was killed by this observer.
      void startObserving(Killable killable)
      Starts a new Thread to wait for the timeout period.
      void stopObserving(Killable killable)
      Stop observing the given Killable, since it is no longer active.
